snippet.title: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO DLC 1 Announcement Trailer "Hero of Justice" Pack
snippet.description:
Get ready to unleash your inner hero in DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO DLC1 – Hero of Justice Pack! 🔥

11 new characters, 1 exclusive costume, 3 custom battles… and that's not all! #DBSZ 

🗓️ Early Access starts January 21st 00:00 CET / January 20th 15:00 PST 🗓️

Follow Dragon Ball Games:
X: https://twitter.com/dragonballgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dragonballgames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DBZ.videogamesUS/

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bandainamcous
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
